TopicTitle: RCS thruster smoke plumes not showing

Articles.Content: Anyone else having this issue after installing realism overhaul ??. The thrusters work but  there is no graphics for the exhaust.

I get the same issue, still looking into it..

What is your setup?
just ckans recommended mods and required mods. also infernal robotics and mechjeb and insteller fuel switch.
Same thing here, I can see the RCS plume if I look real hard but it is multiple times lighter than it was before I installed Realism overhaul. I can barely see the RCS plumes and it is annoying.
